title: Upset over appraisals? See how much Mukesh Ambani got
content: Reliance Industries has sought shareholders’ nod to give Ambani another five years as the chairman and managing director of the company. Ambani, 61, has been on the board of RIL since 1977 and was elevated as chairman of the company after the death of Dhirubhai Ambani in July 2002.
contentSnippet: Reliance Industries has sought shareholders’ nod to give Ambani another five years as the chairman and managing director of the company. Ambani, 61, has been on the board of RIL since 1977 and was elevated as chairman of the company after the death of Dhirubhai Ambani in July 2002.

article.title: Upset over appraisals? See how much Mukesh Ambani got
article.content: Reliance Industries has sought shareholders’ nod to give Ambani another five years as the chairman and managing director of the company. Ambani, 61, has been on the board of RIL since 1977 and was elevated as chairman of the company after the death of Dhirubhai Ambani in July 2002.
